Title: Girl Power
Writer: Douglas Adams (based upon the novels by), Max Landis (created for television by), Sinead Daly, Sinead Daly (executive story editor), Molly Nussbaum (story editor)
Actors: Samuel Barnett, Elijah Wood, Hannah Marks, Fiona Dourif
Plot: The identity of The Boy grows clearer but the villains converge to stop Dirk's team.
